bill.title: Nomination Papers; Candidates for County Elective Office
bill.description: Requires candidates for county elective office to submit a sworn certification by self-subscribing oath that the candidate has complied with the relevant provisions of the applicable county charter and county ordinances. Effective July 1, 2011. (HB593 CD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to JUD, referral sheet 1
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-01-11 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Morita.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 415) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting no (0) and Chong, Nakashima excused (2).
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Carroll, Har, Say, Takai excused (4). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 16).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-16-11 10:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Ihara.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1113) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-12-11.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 480) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 573).
(H) House conferees appointed: Keith-Agaran Chair; Luke, McKelvey, Fontaine.
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 584).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Hee, Chair; Shimabukuro, Co-Chair(s); Kim.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 648).
(H) Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-21-11 10:30AM in conference room 325.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday 04-25-11 3:00PM in conference room 325.

(H) The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Luke, Fontaine; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McKelvey.

(S) The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(H) Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 80) as amended in (CD 1).
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-03-11.
(S) Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 80).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-03-11.
(S) Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 24 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 1 Excused: Hee.

(H) Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 694).
(S) Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 702).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
